texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Find information about our procurement processes and related policies, and overall guidance about being one of our suppliers."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
This guide covers everything you need to know about working with us. It covers the tendering process, what our priorities are, and what we want from our suppliers.
Read the standard GLA Purchase Order Conditions of Contract on the GLA website .
